Are You Looking For Some New Ideas?

Join Us!

Don’t you just love…

…those people who think that pediatric therapy means  you “just play with kids all day.” Or the ones who think you are basically an “over-qualified babysitter”?

Yeah, me too. 🙄

No hard feelings, though. I get it.

Our job is to try to solve unsolvable problems all day. And, we make it look easy.

Because we are professionals.

We both know it’s far from easy.

Being a great therapist means you have to understand information from a million disciplines: OT, PT, speech, medicine, psychology, sociology, finance, pharmacology, technology, biochemistry, etc., etc.

How can anyone possibly keep up?

It’s nearly impossible when you work all day and (try to) have a life. That’s one reason it takes 17 years for new research to be translated into practice.

Our weekly TBL newsletter (short for Therapy, Business, and Life) can help you stay up to date with out-of-the-box ideas that will move your practice forward.

Long-winded emails aren’t our thing. No one has time for that.

Instead, we’ll send you a handful of really good, actionable ideas. No fluff.

It’s time to focus on YOUR potential for a change. That’s what the TBL Newsletter is all about.

Best of all, it’s FREE. And you can unsubscribe anytime.

Give it a try today and be the first to hear about new courses and exclusive course discounts.

You’ll also hear about resources we love, resources our subscribers love, and not-so-timely reviews of books you should probably add to your kindle.

Sometimes we send out surveys to make sure that we’re all still on the same page.

We don’t send spam and we don’t sell your information.

Join us! Sign up below 👇🏼

✕

Be the boss of Your therapy career

(not the other way around)

Our emails have more awesome ideas than you can shake a stick at.
